    • Constructor Detail

      • BBSurface

        public BBSurface(com.threed.jpct.SimpleVector origin,
         float width,
         float height,
         int textureId)
        The constructor for BBSurface. Creates basic plane objects and sets the texture based on given parameters
        Parameters:
        origin - - a vector giving the location of the surface
        width - - the width of the surface
        height - - the height of the surface
        textureId - - the texture id to be applied to the surface
